Text.val: -- Calculation of Max stock facility (client group)
-- Maximum stockfinance as percentage of debtor finance (one client)
-- Maximum stockfinance as percentage of debtor finance (client group)
-- Final calculation of maximal stockfinance on debtors
(Test min() only if values are > 0, reason why testing 99999999999.99)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (CMON_CURRBALSTOCKFACILITY) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CMON join :1/CLNT on CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 where CMON_YEAR = :4 and CMON_MONTH = :5 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':6' and CMON_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CMON_CLNTNO <> :7 for fetch only

select cast(sum(ACCC_MUTAFACTORING) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(ACCC_MUTAEXTRAFIN) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/ACCC where ACCC_ACCT_DATE = ':2' and ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :3 and ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :4 and ACCC_MUTTYPE > 95 for fetch only
select Count(*) from :1/CLNT where CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only

select cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALFACTACC * CLNT402_ADVANCE / 100) + sum(CMON_CURRBALEXTRAFINACC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON join :1/CLNT on CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 where CMON_YEAR = :4 and CMON_MONTH = :5 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':6' and CMON_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO for fetch only

select B.CLNT108_ACC_CURR, cast (sum (A.ACCC_MUTAFACTORING * B.CLNT402_ADVANCE / 100) + sum(A.ACCC_MUTAEXTRAFIN * B.CLNT415_MAXPERCDEBTFINANCE / 100) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/ACCC A join :1/CLNT B on B.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO=:2 and B.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO=:3 where A.ACCC_ACCT_DATE = ':4' and A.ACCC_MUTTYPE > 95 and A.ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = B.CLNT101_ADMNO and A.ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = B.CLNT102_CLNTNO group by B.CLNT108_ACC_CURR order by B.CLNT108_ACC_CURR for fetch only
